DOC.detailed_description: Background The unique characteristic community-health care Thailand system primary- health care officer Village Health Volunteers ( VHVs ) provide basic health care 90 % Thai population . Should allied personnel train render proper chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) care , would interest study whether role play care result well quality CKD care . Design This study community-based cluster randomize control trial conduct 2 district Kamphaeng Phet Province , locate 400 kilometer north Bangkok . About 300 stage 3-4 CKD patient enrol 2 treatment group . Patients group treat accord The National Kidney Foundation Kidney Disease Outcomes Quality Initiative guideline . The District 1 ( control group ) patient provide conventional CKD care . For District 2 ( intervention group ) patient , integrate CKD care program provide multidisciplinary team district hospital conjunction community CKD care network ( i.e . primary-health care officer VHVs ) . The key activity integrate CKD care program live demonstration treatment optimal diet CKD patient provide hospital visit quarterly home visit . Clinical laboratory parameter case assess every 3 month . Duration study 24 month . The primary outcome study rate eGFR decline . The secondary outcome time initiation dialysis , cardiovascular mortality , all-cause mortality .
